subject: Trees and Shrubs
Poisoning and Poisons
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Alabama fan accused of poisoning his rival school’s trees said on a Birmingham radio show that he is going to get what he deserves and that he just has “too much ‘Bama in me.”
snippet: The Alabama fan accused of poisoning his rival school’s trees said on a Birmingham radio show that he is going to get what he deserves and that he just has “too much ‘Bama in me.”
